quotes: No man is happy who does not think himself so.
There is a cosmic law which says that every satisfaction must be paid for with a dissatisfaction.
You use a glass mirror to see your face; you use works of art to see your soul.
Truth is not something outside to be discovered, it is something inside to be realized.
Words can only have a positive effect on others if and when they are ready to listen.
It isn't that they can't see the solution. It is that they can't see the problem.
Rest and be kind, you don't have to prove anything.
Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don't be sorry.
Life is a series of choices and all we can do is make them.
Remain calm. Be kind.
Life is to be fortified by many friendships. To love, and to be loved, is the greatest happiness of existence.
Allow motion to equal emotion.
Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
It is very obvious that we are not influenced by 'facts' but by our interpretation of the facts.
It is truth that liberates, not your effort to be free.
If he cannot stop the mind that seeks after fame and profit, he will spend his life without finding peace.
Fool me once, shame on you; fool me twice, shame on me.
Throw me to the wolves and I will return leading the pack.
Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner.
To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss.
Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
Nothing has more strength than dire necessity.
You play the hand you're dealt. I think the game's worthwhile.
You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.
In all chaos there is a cosmos, in all disorder a secret order.
Fools talk, cowards are silent, wise men listen.
Today I begin a new life. I will greet this day with love in my heart.
As a man thinketh in his heart, so shall he be.
The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work.
When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
I don't ever give up. I'd have to be dead or completely incapacitated.
This is the real secret of life - to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.
A tiny change today brings a dramatically different tomorrow.
A rational person can find peace by cultivating indifference to things outside of their control.
Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do.
Passion creates, addiction consumes.
The strongest and sweetest songs yet remain to be sung.
Without the rain there would be no rainbow.
Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
Avoiding failure is to avoid progress.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
I would rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I'm not.
Poverty and hardship are created by false thinking.
All power is from within and therefore under our control.
Only when I fall do I get up again.
